name: Bye¡Buddy!
description:
Help little buddies to come back home, their mother is really woried... But beware, even if Bye¡Buddy! looks like typical platform game it might be tricky one! The sacriface must be made to let mother see at least one of her children.
Learn controls during the game and master it to lead home as many buddies as possible.

Hope you gonna like this! Made by two during their first start in LD 😉
